items.title: SPARC rebound depends on trial outcomes of other assets, focused, lean R&D approach may help absorb setbacks
items.description: SPARC and its partner Sun Pharma said they will "evaluate the appropriate next steps", but the setback sent its shares tumbling nearly 18% on the BSE on Wednesday.

items.title: Newly-listed Belrise, Aegis Vopak stocks surge up to 6%, Prostarm Info Systems tumbles 5%
items.description: Belrise Industries shares were listed at 11.11% premium to IPO price at Rs 100 apiece on May 28, while Aegis Vopak Terminals shares listed at 6.38% discount to IPO price at Rs 220 apiece on June 2.

items.title: Taking Stock: Market snaps 3-day fall; Nifty closes above 24,600, Sensex up 261 pts
items.description: On the sectoral front, BSE Realty index was down 0.7 percent, while telecom, metal, oil & gas indices added 0.5-1 percent

items.title: ABFRL, Alkem Lab, Suzlon Energy Among Top Losers in Nifty Midcap 150
items.description: The overall sentiment in the market, according to Moneycontrol analysis as of June 4, 2025, is Very Bearish.

items.title: Bajaj Finserv, Trent and Shriram Finance Among Top Losers in Nifty50 Pack Today
items.description: This market alert highlights the intraday performance of these stocks, providing a snapshot of their price movements.

items.title: Gainers & Losers: Stocks that moved the most on June 4
items.description: Here are the top stocks that moved the most on June 4 - from Bharti Airtel to Paytm, take a sneak peak

items.title: Nifty Steady Above 24,600; Gains Led By Metals, IT| SPARC, PI Industries In Focus| Closing Bell Live
items.description: Nifty Steady Above 24,600; snaps 3-day losing streak. Midcaps outperform; market breadth positive. India VIX cools over 4%. Gains Led By Metals, IT; Realty slips, Banks consolidate. Catch Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar

items.title: GlaxoSmithKline Pharma stock jumps 5%, hit 52-week high; among top Midcap gainers today
items.description: The strong financials and positive sentiment may have contributed to GlaxoSmithKline Pharmaceutical's stock reaching a new 52-week high.

items.title: Railway stocks pull all stops: Ircon, RailTel, RVNL, others rally up to 12% on capex push
items.description: Ircon International shares were the top gainer among the pack, jumping over 12 percent to trade at Rs 218 apiece, gaining the most in 20 weeks.

items.title: Nifty Smallcap 100 rises for a third day to add Rs 17,000 crore to market value this week
items.description: The smallcap index ended in the green on seven out of past eight sessions, with the combined market capitalisation higher by over Rs 50,000 crore since May 23.

items.title: India’s EV push could face a massive jolt from China's rare earth magnets curb
items.description: If the supply disruption persists, EV makers could be compelled to raise prices by as much as 8 percent to offset rising input costs.

items.title: Sensex up 200 pts, Nifty above 24,600 as IT, PSU banks surge; small, midcaps shine
items.description: Volatility eased on Wednesday with India VIX, the fear gauge, slipping 4.95 percent to 15.74.

items.title: Tech Mahindra Shares Rise by 1.22%, Experience Increased Trading Volume Today
items.description: The increase in trading volume, coupled with a price rise of 1.22% to Rs 1,562.70, underscores the stock's current market activity.

items.title: Emami shares rise 2.11% during today's session, among top Midcap gainers today
items.description: Emami shares demonstrated a positive movement during today's session, increasing by 2.11% to reach Rs 589.30.

items.title: Eternal Shares Climb 0.74%, Experience Surge in Trading Volume in Today's Session
items.description: With the stock's current price at Rs 239.46 and a notable increase in trading volume, Eternal has shown positive momentum during today's trading session.
